hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 55 in today's
episode I have an idiom for you a bolt
from the blue let's find out what it
means and how you can use it in your
daily conversation a bolt from the blue
in your daily routine you may have faced
something that left you feeling
extremely surprised as it was unexpected
by you the idiom a bolt from the blue
basically means to feel surprised due to
something that you never expected it
means if something happens unexpectedly
and suddenly and you are taken by a
surprise
it is a bolt from the blue 'if a
lightning bolt were to strike a clear
blue sky it would be quite unexpected so
something that occurs out of nowhere and
is a complete surprise to you
it is a bolt from the blue for example
when you heard the news of your friend's
accident it left you feeling shocked as
it was something you never expected and
it happened all of a sudden so this
unpleasant news came to you as a bolt
from the blue in short a bolt from the
blue means to receive some shocking news
all of a sudden and you aren't aware how
you can react to it
okay now that you know what this idiom
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation
example one the news of John's heart
attack was a bolt from the blue to all
his colleagues as he was just in his
late 30s example kill Peter's detention
letter from the college principal left
his parents completely shattered as it
was a bolt from the blue for his parents
example 3 when rosie and william broke
the news of their divorce to both of
their families it was like a bolt from
the blue and left everyone heartbroken
example 4 after reading about the
unreasonable rise in the fuel price it
was a bolt from the blue for all the car
owners and they decided to protest
example 5 the new tax policy came as a
bolt from the blue to everyone as it
left no scope for any savings example 6
the young successful entrepreneurs
suicide was a bolt from the blue to all
the neighbors as they couldn't figure
out the reason for her suicide example 7
then got a bolt from the blue when he
was sacked from the company after been
awarded as the best salesman of the year
example eight Jennifer had a bolt from
the blue when she realized that she had
lost her diamond ring she had no idea
when it slipped off her finger example
nine when the alcoholic decided to
surrender himself to the rehabilitation
center it came as a bolt from the blue
to his wife as she had never expected
him to take such a step
example 10 when John was held to ransom
at at gunpoint it came as a bolt from
the blue as he didn't knew how to react
